src:
Jadi Penentu Kemenangan Juventus, Douglas Costa Bongkar Satu Pesan Penting Sarri
07 Nov 2019, 05:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Douglas Costa berhasil mengantarkan Juventus ke babak 16 besar Liga Champions 2019/20. Satu golnya di ujung laga berperan penting dalam kemenangan 2-1 atas Lokomotiv Moscow, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB.
Pertandingan itu berjalan sulit sejak awal, Juve tidak bisa mengembangkan permainan mereka karena perlawanan kuat tim tuan rumah. Gol Aaron Ramsey di menit ke-4 bisa dibalas Aleksei Miranchuk di menit ke-12, lalu laga terkunci.
Saat pertandingan tampak bakal berakhir imbang, Costa mencetak gol impresif di menit ke-90+3, hasil bekerja sama dengan Gonzalo Higuain. Gol inilah yang jadi penentu pertandingan tersebut.

Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
So the Determinants of Juventus' Victory, Douglas Costa Unloads an Important Message Sarri
Nov 7, 2019, 05:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Douglas Costa managed to deliver Juventus to the last 16 of the 2019/20 Champions League. One goal at the end of the game played an important role in the 2-1 victory over Lokomotiv Moscow on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs.
The match was difficult from the start, Juve could not develop their game because of the home team's strong resistance. Aaron Ramsey's goal in the 4th minute was met by Aleksei Miranchuk in the 12th minute, then the match was locked.
When the match looked about to end in a draw, Costa scored an impressive goal in the 90th minute + 3, the result of working with Gonzalo Higuain. This goal is what determines the match.

Read below, Bolaneters!
